TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompositionContainer extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider implements class System.ComponentModel.Composition.ICompositionService, class System.IDisposable
Public Class CompositionContainer Inherits ExportProvider Implements ICompositionService, IDisposable
type CompositionContainer = class inherit ExportProvider interface ICompositionService interface IDisposable

summary.span: 管理部件的组合。

span.span: Manages the composition of parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象的应用程序中有两个主要目的。A object serves two major purposes in an application. 首先，它跟踪的哪些部分可用于组合、 其依赖项，并执行撰写时可用部分设置的更改。First, it keeps track of which parts are available for composition and what their dependencies are, and performs composition whenever the set of available parts changes. 其次，它提供了应用程序获取的组合部件实例或填充的可组合部件依赖关系的方法。Second, it provides the methods by which the application gets instances of composed parts or fills the dependencies of a composable part. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 部件可提供对容器或者直接或通过属性。Parts can be made available to the container either directly or through the property. 在此可发现的所有部分可供要满足导入，以及直接添加任何部件的容器。All the parts discoverable in this are available to the container to fulfill imports, along with any parts added directly. 方法允许实例化的部件添加到现有的容器。The method allows instantiated parts to be added to an existing container. 假设成功组合，这些部件将具有从容器中检索的部分填充其导入和导出将可供其他部分。Assuming composition is successful, these parts will have their imports filled with parts retrieved from the container, and their exports will be available to other parts. 将被标记为可重新组合的导入注册以进行重新组合。Imports marked as recomposable will be registered for recomposition. 方法允许部分填充而无需添加到容器的导入。The method allows a part to have its imports filled without being added to the container. 如果组合操作成功，将填充部件的导入，但部件的导出将不可用的其他部分并不导入将注册以进行重新组合。If the composition is successful, the part's imports will be filled, but the part's exports will not be available to other parts and no imports will be registered for recomposition. 应始终释放对象。 objects should always be disposed. 当调用方法时，对象也会释放它已创建的所有部分。When the method is called, the object also disposes all the parts that it has created. 一个可以从多个线程访问的对象必须使用构造`isThreadSafe`参数设置为`true`，并使用构造函数。A object that can be accessed from multiple threads must be constructed with the `isThreadSafe` parameter set to `true`, using the constructor. 性能将会稍慢时`isThreadSafe`是`true`，因此我们建议将此参数设置为`false`单线程方案中。Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. > [!WARNING] > 一个本身，或具有对它的引用的部件应永远不会导入。A should never import itself, or a part that has a reference to it. 此类引用可能允许访问容器中的所有部分受信任的一部分。Such a reference could allow an untrusted part to gain access all the parts in the container. ## Examples 在以下示例中，对象和用来填充的一部分导入的目录进行初始化。In the following example, a object is initialized with a catalog and is used to fill the imports of a part. 此示例使用特性化编程模型。This example uses the Attributed Programming Model. [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer/vb/module1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个必须设置对象，它可以从多个线程访问`isThreadSafe`参数`true`。A object that can be accessed from multiple threads must set the `isThreadSafe` parameter to `true`. 性能将会稍慢时`isThreadSafe`是`true`，因此我们建议将此参数设置为`false`单线程方案中。Performance will be slightly slower when `isThreadSafe` is `true`, so we recommend that you set this parameter to `false` in single-threaded scenarios. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Compose(class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionBatch batch) cil managed

param.span: 组合期间要包括的对 的更改。

summary.span: 在容器中添加或移除指定的 中的部件并执行组合。

span.span: Adds or removes the parts in the specified from the container and executes composition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是直接添加或从该容器中删除部件的主要方式。This method is the primary way of directly adding or removing parts from the container. 将始终保持稳定、 组成的状态。The will always maintain a stable, composed state. 因此，调用用空，根本没有必要启动组合。Therefore, calling with an empty is never necessary to start composition. 改为调用方法需要对部件可用于进行更改时随时。Instead, call the method whenever you need to make changes to the parts available to the . 可以包含要添加的部件和要移除的部分。The can contain both parts to be added and parts to be removed. 重新组合会进行一次每次调用。Recomposition will take place only once for each call to . ## Examples 在此简单示例中，三个部分创建并添加到，并检索一个部分以显示已填写所有导入。In this simple example, three parts are created and added to the , and one part is retrieved to show that all imports have been filled. 此示例使用特性化编程模型。This example uses the Attributed Programming Model. [!code-csharp[Composition.CompositionContainer.Compose#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer.compose/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Composition.CompositionContainer.Compose#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/composition.compositioncontainer.compose/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现不应基数相关的不匹配将视为错误，并且不应引发异常的基数相关的不匹配。Implementations should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors and should not throw exceptions for cardinality-related mismatches. 例如，如果导入请求一个导出，该提供程序没有匹配的导出或多个方法应返回一个空的集合对象。For example, if the import requests exactly one export and the provider has either no matching exports or more than one, the method should return an empty collection of objects.

summary.span: 从 中释放指定的 对象。

span.span: Releases the specified object from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的行为可能会有所不同，具体取决于实现的生成实例。The behavior of this method may vary depending on the implementation of the that produced the instance. 一般来说，应从容器中分离非共享导出。As a rule, non-shared exports should be detached from the container. 例如，只会释放如果有来自下构造上下文。For example, the will only release an if it comes from a that was constructed under a context. 发布在此上下文中的意味着每个步骤的依赖关系链分离容器和调用的引用的对象`Dispose`上对象根据需要。Release in this context means walking the dependency chain of the objects, detaching references from the container and calling `Dispose` on the objects as needed. 如果下构造上下文将不执行任何操作，作为指定可能正由其他请求者。If the was constructed under a context the will do nothing, as the specified may being used by other requestors. 仅会分离这些当容器为自身被释放。Those will only be detached when the container is itself disposed.
